I love this game. I put A LOT of time in it. I'm a good killer and usually win when i actually try. But i mostly play survivor with friends and some of these killers are just way to OP. I don't get how people say survivor are the OP ones. If you know what your doing as a killer, you should have no problem winning especially with some of their OP perks. I use basic perks and still win as killer. Killers are defiantly more powerful then survivors. Also flashlights are pointless against killers because all you have to do it turn your head just a little bit. Its ridiculous. That is why i never use a flash light. It never works. lol some of y'all apparently don't know that.

Игра просто Чилл, топ 10 из всех Хороров

Literally just got this game today and it's pairing me with prestige tier players.  If it weren't for the extremely unbalanced match making, I would recommend this game.  But I don't.  You absolutely have to play with a full team to get a decent long game.  It's not about surviving at all.  Its about the long run.  And it's literally impossible to go anywhere or improve when the matches last less that 3 minutes.  The amount of third party hacks that I have seen just in the day I have put into it blew my mind.

天天接车队，累了

Really too bad about the NFTs. 

I stuck through it with DBD ever since there were four survivors. Through every horrible patch and DLC and rework. Camping Bubbas, sandbagging, lag switching, hatch standoffs, glitching into walls and floors and the killer themselves. I've had victory snatched away hundreds of times by jerks running perks designed specifically to ruin your day. This is a game about being horrible to one another, both friend and foe, and I hate it. 

I was willing to put up with all of it. Until this. 

I can stand for all the fictional malice and violence you can dish out, but the morally-bankrupt idea of contributing game assets to an NFT collection is beyond forgivable. Be it out of ignorance or greed, Behaviour has decided to participate in the destruction of our environment. 

After years of seeing them choose shiny new microtransactions over balancing the game, this is enough for me to swear off DBD for good. 

May god have mercy on your stained souls.

macht fun

I used to love this game, so I'm gonna get straight to the point of what is wrong, Killing isn't fun anymore.  First of all, you may look at my hours and go wow he has no idea what he is talking about but I used to play on console and had over 500 hours on it.  Again loved this game, when I moved to PC I played a couple of those free day weekends and decided after loving the 5th aniversary that I would pay money to buy this again, you're welcome devs :). In terms of the survivor life couldn't be better right now at least in game.  I get a majority of the player base plays survivor, how I know is killer games are insta-queues nearly every single time, I can wait 2 minutes max and find a match as a killer.  As a survivor queues are long like 10 minutes long at most, 7 minutes on average and I play in the lowest rank right now the rank everyone else should be, when I used to play on console I maxed at a rank 1 trapper and I thought I was very good at the game, but I don't know who these survivors are but man, for a ranking system built off metals ash should be rock bottom, but these survivors give me the hardest time ever and always making me wanna switch to someone like oni, or spirit, or that new guy which isn't fair.... just understood that money scheme they have going, if you are even still reading what I mean is I can't stand playing this game anymore, as a killer, survivors fun as hell.  Let me explain why, KILLING IS FUCKING IMPOSSIBLE NOW AS THE BASE CHARACTERS, by the time it takes you as any of the base characters to hook one fucking person, even if you start the game chasing someone, this happened in my last game where it took me a whooping 30 seconds to find and down someone, I remember saying wow I'm doing great, this should be an easy game, 3 gens go off, as i just finish hooking the guy, this hurts my soul, I have 3/5s of my bitter murmur gone. well I have 2 choices now. 1 go chase 2 facecamp(like a noob), obviously as a rank 1 I know facecamping is something for fools who only want to kill someone for sure or for toxic people that get mad at someone running from them... Well I run around to where I think one of them went I, I find him and he begins running to this spot, which is a basic jump location, its on the barnhouse map, theres a vault spot and a wall. I get looped there for 20 seconds, blood lust kicks in, guy gets unhooked and another gen pops.  This match has gone on for no longer than a minute and the survivors are already 1 gen away, which means if I didnt hook that guy I would've been put into the final stand within about 1 minute 20 seconds, I cannot understand why the devs think that option where it doesn't matter how a killer plays they lose, right money killers have privileges, like being able to teleport, instadown people, and rush around the map.  But thats not my issue, even they cannot be expected to kill a whole lobby say I was the oni that game instead of wraith, I get the first guy then go rushing around and probably down the next guy and what, 4 gens are already done completlely unfair, theres no way to win, in the time it takes to bring one person to the downed state and hook them 3 gens can get done, and unlike survivors killers can't go unhook a gen.  they have 3 times we have to do that until we kill one person, thats 9 gens done, for 1 fully dead person.  I never write reviews on really anything but I really enjoy this game but I can't stand the state its in, Killers can't do anything and not even if they play well, 30 seconds in downing and hooking someone is something the killer should be massively rewarded for not expected to do better.  Shitty game right now do not purchase it unless you plan on playing survivor in which you should know that not only do you always have the advantage, you have the biggest advantage on the planet and thats no fun for killers, so then killers leave, queue times get longer for survivors, so maybe some survivors leave and then a loop is developed since the only people who are gonna keep playing it and sit through those queues are people who are better, people that know how to win because they want to.  nothing against those people but as a killer player it is near impossible to beat anyone due to loops, killers that aren't privileged like spirit, the new guy, and demogorgan have no way to win. Again even they would just lose, you cannot win that put any of the killers into the match I played and tell me how to win, how can you win if you play optimally but that doesn't matter because a bunch of stupid people went immediately to gens, don't say the survivors were playing optimally because none were in a discord call, that was on accident.... what I said happened then after one was found by me and was getting chased, one unhooked his friend and one completed another gen, and my objective was 1/12 complete and their objective was 4/5 complete, and hex ruin don't do nothing to that, insta-mori mike myres is the only way I could see me even being able to rank up from this game, I would expect to only get 2 at best. Too bad the only way to gaurentee a rank-up is by getting 3 killed with mories since mories count for less that makes it impossible to play. rant over game is shit

2018年のハロウィンイベント中に無料プレイ出来、かつ半額で販売されていたのでさっそく無料でやってみました。
当時はニコ生で「Steam」で検索かけても、どこを向いてもDBDだらけでうんざりしていましたが、いざ自分でやってみたらこれが思いのほか楽しくてすっかり虜になり、即刻ハロウィンセール価格の半額で購入しました。
元々ホラー映画が大好きだったので、様々な映画からキラーがコラボ出演しているホラー映画アベンジャーズみたいなこの作品はツボです。
プレイ開始当時、現在行われているハロウィンイベントのBGMが流れていたので、このBGMにはひときわ思い入れがあります。
非対称
